Detailed Description

The list of Request that should be send to the Modules.

Member Function Documentation

RequestContainer* RequestQueue::dequeue (   ) 
 

Get the next request from the list.

If the list is empty, then the method hangs until a request is available.

Returns:
The next request container from the list.

bool RequestQueue::enqueue (  RequestContainer *  req  ) 
 

Insert a new request into the list.

Parameters:
req The request container to add.
Returns:
True if the request container is added alright, false otherwise.

void RequestQueue::terminate (   ) 
 

Set the terminated-variable to true and notifies all the threads that might be waiting for this monitor.

Member Data Documentation

bool RequestQueue::terminated [private]
 

Used to make is possible to check if the system is to be halted.

True if the system is going down, false otherwise.
